summary: This is an email from the law firm Smith Villazor LLP to defense counsel regarding proposed redactions to a court memo-endorsement in the case US v. Maxwell. The email indicates the firm plans to redact specific text and seeks confirmation from defense counsel regarding any additional proposed redactions.

persons.name: Patrick Smith
persons.context: Appears as a recipient or sender in the email correspondence regarding redactions in the US v. Maxwell case.

persons.name: Suzanne Kowalski

connections.description: Communicating via email regarding legal redactions in the US v. Maxwell case.

events.title: Submission of letter to court
events.description: A letter was submitted to the court regarding the US v. Maxwell case.

events.title: Proposed redactions to court memo-endorsement
events.description: Smith Villazor LLP proposes redactions to the court's memo-endorsement of their November 23, 2021 letter.

locations.context: Address of Smith Villazor LLP law firm.

keyFacts: The document is an email regarding proposed redactions to a court memo-endorsement in the case US v. Maxwell.
Smith Villazor LLP indicates they plan to redact specific 'red-boxed' text from the court's memo-endorsement.
The email seeks confirmation from defense counsel regarding any additional proposed redactions.
The correspondence suggests ongoing legal proceedings and document handling in the Maxwell case as of November 2021.
